<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_58872_needit_needit</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>testBR</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {

    // Add your code here
    //Number of NeedIt records to create
	try{
		var recordsToMake = 0;

    // Declare and initialize variables used in the script
    var genNIRec;
    var i;
    var tableName = "x_58872_needit_needit";
    var requestTypeArray = ["facilities", "hr", "legal"];
    var selectRequestType = "";
    var selectWhatNeeded = 3;
    var pickDate = 1;
    var requestedForArray = [{
        "name": "Fred Luddy",
        "email": "fred.luddy@example.com"
    }, {
        "name": "Beth Anglin",
        "email": "beth.anglin@example.com"
    }, {
        "name": "System Administrator",
        "email": "admin@example.com"
    }];
    var pickUser = 10;
    var stateArray = [{
        "name": "Requested",
        "value": "13"
    }, {
        "name": "Approved",
        "value": "15"
    }, {
        "name": "Closed Complete",
        "value": "3"
    }, {
        "name": "Awaiting Approval",
        "value": "14"
    }];
    var pickState = 10;

    //For loop to create records
    for (i = 0; i < recordsToMake; i++) {

        //Create an empty record for the NeedIt table
        genNIRec = new GlideRecord(tableName);
        genNIRec.newRecord();


        //Select a random value from the requestType array and set the Request Type field value (choice)
        selectRequestType = requestTypeArray[(Math.floor(Math.random() * 3))];
        genNIRec.setValue("u_request_type", selectRequestType);


        //Set the What needed field value (choice) from the Request Type and either 1 or 2
        selectWhatNeeded = (Math.floor(Math.random() * 2) + 1);
        genNIRec.setValue("u_what_needed", selectRequestType + selectWhatNeeded);

        //Set the Short description field value (string)
        genNIRec.setValue("short_description", "Automatically created NeedIt request: " + selectRequestType + ", " + selectRequestType + selectWhatNeeded);

        //Set the When needed field value (date/time) to a date between six months from now and six months ago
        var rightNow = new GlideDateTime();
        pickDate = (Math.floor(Math.random() * 366) - 182);
        rightNow.addDaysUTC(pickDate);
        genNIRec.setValue("u_when_needed", rightNow.getDate());


        //Set the Requested for field value (reference) by selecting a random user from requestedForArray.
        //Also set the Requested for email field value (string).  The reference field cannot be set in a scoped app
        //using the setValue method unless using the sys_id to set the field value.  To set by display name, use 
        //the GlideElement setDisplayValue method.  gr.<field_name>.setDisplayValue(<value>). 
        pickUser = (Math.floor(Math.random() * 3));
        genNIRec.u_requested_for.setDisplayValue(requestedForArray[pickUser].name);
        genNIRec.setValue("u_requested_for_email", requestedForArray[pickUser].email.toString());


        //Set the Priority field value (choice) to a random value
        genNIRec.setValue("priority", (Math.floor(Math.random() * 5) + 1));

        //Set the State field value (choice) to Requested
        pickState = (Math.floor(Math.random() * stateArray.length));
        genNIRec.setValue("state", stateArray[pickState].value);

        //Insert the new NeedIt record into the table
        genNIRec.insert();
    }
	}catch(error){
		gs.error("NeedIT app testBR error: " +error);
	}

    

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-31 16:32:12</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>e1972cc993a202105d1e7b732bba1029</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>testBR</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_e1972cc993a202105d1e7b732bba1029</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-31 16:33:28</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before_display</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=e1972cc993a202105d1e7b732bba1029"/></record_update>
